title: Alesha Dixon wows BGT fans in see-through bejewelled gown during final

Britain's Got Talent: The Champions judge Alesha Dixon left fans in awe in a stunning see-through floor-length gown for the final on Saturday night.

The star who was pregnant at the time of filming revealed her huge baby bump in the frock, which featured silver jewels from top to bottom.

Her sparkly plunging dress had further detail on the three-quarter length sleeves, with white frills at each end - with the same material on the bottom of the frock.

Alesha completed the look with a pair of silver earrings, and her hair half up and half down.

(Image: Instagram)

Viewers were loving her latest look, with the BGT judge wearing an array of amazing outfits each week.

Taking to Instagram , she gave a glimpse of her outfit and fans complimented her finale look as she took to the panel once more.

One viewer said: "Darling you look so beautiful."

(Image: Dymond/Thames/Syco/REX)

Another tweeted: "You look beautiful."

Others shared their confusion, with Alesha still pregnant in the snap despite it recently reported she had welcomed her second child. BGT was pre-recorded earlier in the year.

A fan asked: "Thought you had the baby?" as another commented: "Safe delivery."

(Image: Dave J Hogan/Getty Images)

It comes after the news the star has given birth, after she was pictured heading to filming for America's Got Talent: The Champions this week.

Alesha wore a black crop top as she headed out in Los Angeles.

The singer confirmed news of her pregnancy during a live episode of Britain's Got Talent back in May.

Britain's Got Talent returns in 2020.
description: Britain's Got Talent: The Champions judge Alesha Dixon was pregnant while filming the ITV series finale
